ticket.title: PCAC verifier economics instrumentation and bounded enforcement

tickets.reason: Lifecycle operations must be wired before meaningful p95 and proof-check metrics can be measured.
Receipt-auth verification path must be present before verifier economics can be bounded and enforced.

in_scope: Instrument join/revalidate/consume and anti-entropy verification paths for p95 and proof-check-count metrics.
Implement policy checks for declared verifier-economics bounds by risk tier.
Fail closed Tier2+ admissions when bounds are exceeded and no degraded-mode path is admissible.
Capture benchmark outputs for gate evidence.
out_of_scope: Generic runtime performance optimization outside PCAC verifier paths.
Degraded-mode policy redesign beyond enforcement hooks.

steps: Add metrics and timers around PCAC verification operations and proof-check routines.
Implement bound-evaluation checks and deny paths for Tier2+ admissions.
Add stress/load tests to validate bound behavior and deny semantics.
Produce benchmark artifacts mapped to EVID-0005 expected contents.
Run cargo fmt --all && cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings && cargo test --workspace.

criteria: p95 bounds are measured and enforceable for join/revalidate/consume/anti-entropy operations.
Tier2+ admissions deny when declared economics bounds are exceeded without admissible degraded mode.
Benchmark evidence is reproducible and linked to defined profile thresholds.

notes.security: Economics enforcement is part of containment; overload cannot silently relax authority checks.
notes.verification: Include bound-exceedance tests with explicit deny assertions by risk tier.
